full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON PO LA BRTEN PA'I GLUD RDZONGS 'GAL RKYEN PHYIR BZLOG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA, DBU  MDZAD NGAG DBANG YUL BYUNG,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES BRJOD CING SBYIN BDAG GIS PHYOGS NGAN DU BSKYIL BZHIN BZLOG PA BYA BA 'TSAMS CAD, ,GLUD BSKYIL MKHAN PHYI MIG MI BLTA, MJUG CHO GA BKRA SHIS SOGS DKYUS BZHIN BYA'O, ,MGON PO LA BRTEN PA'I GLUD RDZONGS SHIN TU BSDUS PA 'DI YI RJE BTZUN BSTAN PA KUN DGA' KUN BSTAN PA SKYID 'JOM KYI PA'I RONG SO MU'I GRVA TSANG, DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING GI MCHOD DPON DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA DANG DBU  MDZAD NGAG DBANG YUL BYUNG GNYIS KYIS MGON PO LA BRTEN GLUD RDZONGS BSDUS PA ZHIG BSGRIGS, ,ZER BA'I NGO BSRUNG PHYIR, ,CHOS RJES THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN BDAG GI RJE BTZUN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I MDZAD PA'I, ,MGON PO LA BRTEN PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR LEN PA BLANGS TE, BSGRIGS PA LA SPYAN LDAN MKHAS PA'I TSOGS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZOD, ,DGE BA'I 'GRO KUN GLO BUR BAR GCOD NAD LAS GROL GYUR CIG , ,,YI GE PA NI SHI TAR PI LIG THU DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG RIGS GROL LO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
